page.title: 11NOTABLE LOCAL EVENTS 2
page.content: {NOTABLE LOCAL EVENTS.-COUNTRY LANES.} COUNTRY ROADS ARE VERY DANGEROUS AND WE HAVE HAD A FEW ACCIDENTS ON THEM.WE WERE COMING HOME FROM SCHOOL AND WE WERE GOING VERY SLOWLY AND AS WE CAME TO A SHARP BEND A MINI CAR CAME ROUND.I CLOSED MY EYES AND HEARD A CRASH.A PIECE OF FLYING GLASS HIT ME BUT I WAS NOT HURT.THE MINI HAD BECOME JAMMED BETWEEN OUR CAR AND THE HEDGE.MY BROTHER WAS CRYING SO I TRIED TO COMFORT HIM.MY MUM REVERSED OUR CAR AWAY AND THE MINI FELL BACK ON TO THE ROAD AND DROVE OFF WITHOUT EVEN AN APOLOGY WHILST WE CONTINUED OUR JOURNEY HOME EVEN MORE SLOWLY.YES,ON SMALL COUNTRY LANES, {BE CAREFUL,ALWAYS!! }
